string.value: An unknown lady in Kerning City spends yet another day shivering in coldness. I should hear her side of the story.
Am I even allowed to take these...? I do feel like helping her find true love though... Whoever that may be... well, these are dropped by #b#o7130300##k, alright. \n#t04000148# #b#c04000148##k/100
I surely wish she makes a good couple with that special someone. Hahaha...But then again, it's a little disturbing, come to think of it. I better ask her what's up next time.
I feel like I carry every single misery this world can offer... well, I know I'm not pompous at all, but just standing here makes me feel like that ... you know ... isn't that strange?
But the existence of the ray of light, a warm ray of light, the one that melts away my ice-cold heart. Now that makes me feel warm and tingly myself.
I think I'm falling for someone here! Hey, will you be my cupid?
I wish you could gather up something for me ... and that would be #b#t04000148##k, the one that #b#o7130300##k drops. Yeah, with that, my love is bound to be realized! Really!
No, no, really, I'm not going to use it in a matter that may seem strange at all. It's just ... a simple wish of a girl ... you know, the meaningless, spell like ... you know what I mean. Thanks
Ohhh, it's cold here...\nAnd my heart freezes...

Thank you so much for participating, I mean, helping out a girl's wish. Hopefully, if this works out, then I'll tell you my love story sometime later. For now, here's the advance payment, no I mean, a reward. Please take it.
I can't control, I mean, win his heart with it. I need more than that!
